Blog.post: I'm just now every busy about my assignment cos i didn't plan what supposed to do. This is Tips for manage time...If you can do this You may have sometime to do what you really want to do. "Never put of till tomorrow what can be done today" 1. Plan ahead: yearly, monthly, weekly, daily 2. Priorities within your plan under two heading: What must you do? What would you like to do? 3. Write a daily task list on a small Post-it. If wonât fit, youâre trying to do too much 4. Recognize your limits: If youâre continually trying to do too much and failing, cut something out. 5.Protect you âred timeâ : Donât let yourself be interrupted Remember: âGood enoughâ will do most of the time. Donât waste time in pursuit of âPerfect'

Action/Comedy : Envy (July 23, 2004) - -Tim ( Ben Stiller ) and Nick ( Jack Black ) are best friends, neighbors and co-workers whose equal footing is suddenly tripped up when one of Nickâs get-rich-quick schemes actually succeeds: Vapoorizer, a spray that literally makes dog poop, or any other kind for that matter, evaporate. Tim, who dismissed Nickâs idea and passed up the chance to get in on the deal, can only watch as Nickâs fortune â and Timâs own envy â grow to out â rageous proportions. The flames of jealousy are fanned by an oddball drifter ( Christopher Walken ) who takes it upon himself to help fix Timâs situation, but only causes more chaos. Could you name a better cast? Well, could you? Thought not. urlLink Your personal guide to the movies . For full movie reviews and local showtimes...

I used to study in French . Do you know? Over 50,000 English word have their origin in French. French is one of the official languages of the United Nations french has the world's greatest number of Noble Prize winners for literature. French is the world's major tourist destination (60 million people visit French annually) This year, over 600 Thai students have been granted visas to study in French, furthering their education in management and commerce, language, science and engineering, tourism and hotel managemanet, including art and fashion. Why "FRENCH FRIES"? French fries is an expreeion that goes back to Thomas Jefferson , the third president of USA. On a trip to Frence he discovered thinly-sliced, deep-fried potatoes. when he got back home Thomas served the potatoes to his friends calling them "French fries".

A magical MOUSE A star is born ; Mickey Mouse was created by Walter Elias Disney also know as Walt Disney who was 26 at the time. Not many pepole know, however, the his birthplace wasn't in a studio like most cartoon characters. Mickey was born on a train. Mickey appeared in Disney's imagination early in 1928 while he was riding a train from New York to Los Angeles with his wife. Disney had jist returned from a business meeting in which he had lost the rights to a previous character, Oswald the Lucky Rabbit, so he needed something to replace Oswald. "It All Started With A Mouse" a great musical show all about Mickey Mouse July 23-26, 2004 at Central City Bangna Showtimes: 1pm, 3pm, 5pm, 7pm
American pop singer Whitne Houston arrived Bangkok yesterday. she will appear in a urlLink concert (whitney lives in Bangkok) on July 19 at Impact Arena, Muang Thong Thani Bangkok.
First Thai woman who won Gold medallist. urlLink urlLink

Udomporn Polsak , 24, who is ready to outmuscle all her challengers in the women's 53kg weightlifting . The first Thai woman won an Olympic gold medal in Athens 2004. We have got 2 Gold medal in Olympic before from Boxing (Somluck Kamsing won the first ever Olympic gold medal for Thailand in Atlanta , in the 1996 Olympics and Vijan Ponrit won Sydney Olympics in 2000 )

It was while running into the building in the heavily rain. Oop! My shoes was slipperyâ¦Oh! My right foot got pain A few minuets later, it swelled up. I was sitting and was thinking about my colleagues teased me about this glass slipper. They first saw this shoe in shoes shelf and guessed thatâs my shoesâ¦.The first question is âDo you meet Prince?â Cinderella!!! Me? That time, I was thinking of fairy tales. In the first of the story Princess is grueling; have to face with cruel stepmother or witch. However the story must be end with happiness. That only happened in the end of fairy tales. In real lifeâ¦The end means breaking up and divorce. Recently I saw someone has broken up with her boyfriendâ¦Iâd like to say âBe a single is betterâ in the case; previously, she used to be cool and was feeling in bad mood (often) when she had a any problem with her bf. After breaking upâ¦She has changed. She is lively, now Jâ¦I like that. So! Whatâs love mean? If your life is getting better when youâre single. I used to think about loveâs definition. I just realizeâ¦that the word love no meaning, love is feelingâ¦anyway Iâm now feeling in love with my Princeâ¦Even he is far from me 1,444 km. I always am smile knowingly when I think of him. I met Prince Guys!!!!

I just went to Singapore a few days ago. I was missing Thai food a lot. Thai Food has full 4 tastes; Sour, Salty, Spicy, Sweetâ¦really!!! Even just a noodle fried âPad Thaiâ Itâs famous here. I had noodles with soup (Quay-Teow Chinese food) not salty, not sweet, not chilli. Itâs tasteless! By the way I realize one thing. Donât believe in first sight!!! I used to dislike Indian food (non vegetarian). A few months ago, my boyfriend had taken me to a North Indian restaurant where he thought it serves the best food. Yes, it may be the best but not for me! Cos I felt donât enjoy eating there any more. This time he took me to this new place which serves only Indian vegetarian food. We ordered 5 dishes. I like 4 of them a lot. There are full of taste. I was wondering...Wow these are made from vegetablesâ¦how they taste so good! Dont judge a food by sight. Try the same at another place.

The Ministry of Information and Communication Technology organize the ICT innovation platform in Thailand called Bangkok International ICT Expo 2004 from August 4 to 8, 2004 at IMPACT Exhibition and Convention Centre, Bangkok. Many IT operators, international manufacturers and service providers will be exhibiting to show their potential of becoming the ICT Hub of ASEAN . The exhibition will held at Hall 9 and Hall 10
